title: High Bribery Incidence
description: In 2017, 56.1% of firms in Liberia reported experiencing at least one bribe payment request, indicating a significant challenge in the business environment.

title: Significant Net Forest Depletion
description: In 2021, Liberia experienced a net forest depletion of 17.54% of its GNI, highlighting environmental sustainability concerns.

title: Low GDP Per Capita
description: As of 2023, Liberia's GDP per capita stood at 771.89 LCU, reflecting economic challenges and low income levels.

title: Low GNI Per Capita
description: In 2023, Liberia's GNI per capita was recorded at 722.19 LCU, indicating limited economic prosperity.

title: Limited Basic Handwashing Facilities
description: In 2022, only 3.44% of Liberia's population had access to basic handwashing facilities, underscoring public health challenges.

title: Low Transport Services Export
description: In 2022, transport services accounted for just 0.39% of Liberia's service exports, indicating limited diversification in service exports.

title: Low New Business Density
description: With only 0.025 new registrations per 1,000 people aged 15-64 in 2022, Liberia shows a low rate of new business formation.

title: High Over-age Female Students in Primary Education
description: In 2017, 46.53% of female students in primary education were over-age, indicating challenges in the education system.

title: Low Military Expenditure
description: In 2023, Liberia's military expenditure was 37,153,000 LCU, reflecting limited defense spending.

title: Limited Urban Handwashing Facilities
description: As of 2022, only 5.64% of the urban population in Liberia had access to basic handwashing facilities, highlighting urban public health issues.

title: Low Value Added in Services Per Worker
description: In 2023, the value added per worker in Liberia's service sector was 1,004.08 constant 2015 US$, indicating low productivity.

title: Limited Voice and Accountability
description: In 2023, Liberia had 14 sources for voice and accountability, reflecting challenges in governance and civic engagement.
